trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> 대리자를 만들 때, 이벤트를 처리할 메서드를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 이벤트 처리기와 연결하려면 대리자의 인스턴스를 해당 이벤트에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 제거하지 않는 경우 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 이벤트 처리기가 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기 대리자에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [이벤트 처리 및 발생](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에 사용 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> 대리자는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> 열거형 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> 속성.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 예제를 실행 하는 폼에 다음 코드를 붙여넣습니다.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 호출 된 `InitializeStatusBarPanels` 폼의 생성자 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> 이벤트 처리 메서드.
